poem.title: Their Favourite Things
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Clingfilmed Cadillac, shark finned and grinned With Frigidaire doorhandles. Ivy-League widows, defrilled and deskilled Frigged and fulfilled, who fibbed and stayed true To whisper-fridged kitchens and soft-figged shade Choc-full of goodies that Fizzed and frizzed in contact with the heat They couldn't take.
